metadata.title: CVE-2017-8844 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.description: The read_1g function in stream.c in liblrzip.so in lrzip 0.631 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer overflow and application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted archive.

criterions.comment: lrzip package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.631+git180528-1').
